Metadata.name: aipolaroid
Metadata.title: AI Polaroid Generator — Free; Two-Photo Hug | aipolaroid
Metadata.description: Create Polaroid-style photos free. Upload 1–2 photos; classic border, subtle grain, date/handwriting. Watermark-free PNGs. Two-Photo Hug & Celebrity modes.

HomePage.title: AI Polaroid Generator
HomePage.description: Turn your photos into instant-film keepsakes — free, fast, and watermark-free.

hero.title: Free AI Polaroid Generator — Real Instant-Film Look
hero.description: Upload 1–2 photos and get classic white borders, thicker bottom, subtle grain, and optional date stamp in one click. Start with trending modes like “Hug My Younger Self” or “Celebrity Polaroid” — more styles on the way.

generator.title: Try the AI Polaroid playground
generator.description: Test with sample photos or your own and watch borders, grain, date stamps, and captions render in real time.

howToUse.label: How aipolaroid works
howToUse.title: Create your AI Polaroid in three quick steps
howToUse.description: Editable, prefilled prompts for consistent instant-film results.

upload.title: Upload 1–2 photos
upload.description: Use a present-day selfie plus an optional childhood photo or a rights-cleared celebrity image.

mode.title: Pick a mode or style
mode.description: Start with “Hug My Younger Self” or “Celebrity Polaroid,” then explore more styles as we roll them out.

generate.title: Generate
generate.description: Click Generate to get a high-res, watermark-free PNG in seconds — then tweak prompts for new variations.

features.title: Why creators choose aipolaroid
features.subtitle: Retro polish without manual editing
features.description: Instant-film details are built in — from borders and grain to date stamps and handwriting.

item-1.title: Authentic instant-film finish
item-1.description: Clean white borders with thicker bottoms, subtle grain, natural skin, and optional date/handwriting.

item-2.title: Modes & styles that grow
item-2.description: Launch with Younger-Self and Celebrity; add more styles over time without changing your workflow.

item-3.title: Fast and consistent
item-3.description: One-click renders with editable prompts for reliable, share-ready results.

item-4.title: Privacy-friendly downloads
item-4.description: High-resolution, watermark-free PNGs ready for Instagram, scrapbooks, or prints.

features2.title: Built for social, printing, and nostalgia drops
features2.subtitle: Dial in every detail — no Photoshop needed
features2.description: Adjust prompts, ratios, and captions while our AI handles the vintage finish for feeds or 4×6 prints.
features2.feature-1: Caption variables for dates, locations, and signatures on the thicker bottom border.
features2.feature-2: Save favorite prompts and reuse them across modes and upcoming styles.
features2.feature-3: Batch up to four variations to compare poses and lighting side by side.
features2.feature-4: Download high-res PNGs optimized for sharing and printing.

faqs.title: AI Polaroid FAQs
faqs.subtitle: Everything you need before you generate

item-1.question: Do I need an account?
item-1.answer: You can preview with sample images right away. Creating Polaroids from your own photos may require sign-in to keep the service reliable.

item-2.question: How do credits work?
item-2.answer: Sign-up bonus: 50 credits. Free Plan: 50 credits added monthly. Each render costs 10 credits. Unused monthly credits don’t roll over. Rates may change as we improve the service.

item-3.question: Can I upload celebrity or childhood photos?
item-3.answer: Yes — only if you own or are permitted to use them. Personal, non-commercial use; no impersonation or deceptive use.

item-4.question: Are downloads watermarked?
item-4.answer: No. Exports are high-resolution PNGs without watermarks.

item-5.question: What Polaroid details are included?
item-5.answer: Classic white border with a thicker bottom, subtle grain, natural skin tones, and optional date stamp plus handwritten caption.

item-6.question: Will you add more styles?
item-6.answer: Yes. We’re starting with Younger-Self and Celebrity and will add more styles regularly.

item-1.name: Jonathan Yombo
item-1.quote: MkSaaS is really extraordinary and very practical, no need to break your head. A real gold mine.

item-2.name: Yves Kalume
item-2.quote: With no experience in webdesign I just redesigned my entire website in a few minutes with tailwindcss thanks to MkSaaS.

item-3.name: Yucel Faruksahan
item-3.quote: Great work on MkSaaS template. This is one of the best personal website that I have seen so far :)

item-4.name: Anonymous author
item-4.quote: I downloaded the one of MkSaaS template which is very clear to understand at the start and you could modify the codes/blocks to fit perfectly on your purpose of the page.

item-5.name: Shekinah Tshiokufila
item-5.quote: MkSaaS is redefining the standard of web design, with these blocks it provides an easy and efficient way for those who love beauty but may lack the time to implement it.

item-6.name: Oketa Fred
item-6.quote: I absolutely love MkSaaS! The component blocks are beautifully designed and easy to use, which makes creating a great-looking website a breeze.

item-7.name: Zeki
item-7.quote: MkSaaS is the perfect fusion of simplicity and versatility, enabling us to create UIs that are as stunning as they are user-friendly.

item-8.name: Joseph Kitheka
item-8.quote: MkSaaS has transformed the way I develop web applications. Their extensive collection of UI components, blocks, and templates has significantly accelerated my workflow.

item-9.name: Khatab Wedaa
item-9.quote: MkSaaS is an elegant, clean, and responsive tailwind css components it's very helpful to start fast with your project.

item-10.name: Rodrigo Aguilar
item-10.quote: I love MkSaaS ❤️. The component blocks are well-structured, simple to use, and beautifully designed. It makes it really easy to have a good-looking website in no time.

item-11.name: Eric Ampire
item-11.quote: MkSaaS templates are the perfect solution for anyone who wants to create a beautiful and functional website without any web design experience.

item-12.name: Roland Tubonge
item-12.quote: MkSaaS is so well designed that even with a very poor knowledge of web design you can do miracles. Let yourself be seduced!
